pages.text: 26|1|ta sim mim. (Napiye!) Ivai telivana ivvetattin vacanankalakum
26|2|ta sim mim. (Napiye!) Ivai telivana ivvetattin vacanankalakum
26|3|(napiye!) Avarkal (um'mai) nampikkai kollatatan karanamaka (tukkattal) ninkal tarkolai ceytu kolvir polum
26|4|nam virumpinal avarkalutaiya kaluttukal panintu kunintu varumpati (vetanai) ceyyakkutiya attatcikalai vanattiliruntu avarkal mitu nam irakkiyiruppom
26|5|rahmanitamiruntu putitana oru nallupatecam varumpotellam atai avarkal (nirakarittu) purakkanikkamal iruppatillai
26|6|(Akave, itaiyum) niccayamaka avarkal poyyakkukinranar. Eninum, avarkal etaip (poyyakkip) parikacittuk kontirukkirarkalo atan (unmai) ceytikal niccayamaka avarkalitam vante tirum
26|7|avarkal pumiyaip parkkavillaiya? Atil ovvoru vakaiyilum (payanalikkak kutiya) melana ettanaiyo purpuntukalai joti jotiyakave nam mulaippittu irukkirom
26|8|niccayamaka itil or attatci irukkiratu. Eninum, avarkalil perumpalanavarkal nampikkai kollavillai
26|9|(napiye!) Umatu iraivan niccayamaka (anaivaraiyum) mikaittavan,maka karunaiyutaiyavan avan
26|10|(napiye!) Umatu iraivan musavai alaittu ‘‘nir aniyayakkararkalana hpir'avnutaiya makkalitam celviraka'' enak kuriyatai nir kavanittup parppiraka
26|12|atarku avar ‘‘en iraivane! Avarkal ennaip poyyakki vituvarkal ena nan payappatukiren'' enrar
26|13|innum, “(avvaru avarkal poyyakkinal) en manamutaintu vitum. (Attutan enakkuk konal iruppatal) en naval (cariyakap) pecamutiyatu. Atalal (ennutan) varumaru harunukku ni arivippayaka
26|14|melum, en mitu avarkalukku oru kurraccattutalum irukkiratu. Atarkaka avarkal ennaik kolai ceytu vituvarkal ena nan payappatukiren'' (enrum kurinar)

26|15|atarku (iraivan) kuriyatavatu: ‘‘Avvaralla (payappatatir; harunaiyum alaittuk kontu) ninkal iruvarum en attatcikalai (etuttu)k kontu cellunkal. Niccayamaka nan unkalutan iruntu (anaittaiyum) kettuk kontiruppen
26|16|Akave, ninkaliruvarum hpir'avnitam cenru, ‘‘niccayamaka nankal ulakattar anaivaraiyum pataittu paripalippavanin tutarkalavom
26|17|akave, ‘‘israyilin cantatikalai ni enkalutan anuppivitu'' enak kurunkal! (Enpatakavum kattalaiyittan)

26|18|(avvare avarkal hpir'avnitam cenru kurave) atarkavan (musavai nokki) “nankal um'maik kulantaiyaka etuttukkontu valarkkavillaiya? Nir (umatu valipattai ataiyum varai) pala varutankal nam'mitam valntiruntir
26|19|nir cey(yat taka)ta (oru) kariyattaiyum ceytir! (Atai mannittiruntum) nir nanri kettavarakave irukkirir'' enran
